x1, y1, x2, y2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
x, y = list(map(int, input().split()))

x, y = abs(x), abs(y)

x_ = abs(x2 - x1)
y_ = abs(y2 - y1)

if x_ % x == 0 and y_ % y == 0:
    if (x_ // x + y_ // y) % 2 == 0:
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")
else:
    print("NO")

dx = abs(x2 - x1)
dy = abs(y2 - y1)

if dx % x != 0 or dy % y != 0:
    print("NO")
else:
    kx = dx // x
    ky = dy // y

    if (kx % 2) == (ky % 2):
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")

line1 = input()
line2 = input()

coords = list( map(int, line1.split()) )
v1, v2 = list( map(int, line2.split()) )

dx = coords[2] - coords[0]
dy = coords[3] - coords[1]

if dx % v1 == 0 and dy % v2 == 0 and \
  (dx // v1 - dy // v2) % 2 == 0:
    print ('YES')
else:
    print ('NO')



def main():
    x1, y1, x2, y2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x, y = list(map(int, input().split()))

    if abs(x2 - x1) % x or abs(y2 - y1) % y:
        print('NO')
        return

    if (abs(x2 - x1) // x + abs(y2 - y1) // y) % 2 == 0:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

main()
a,b,c,d=input().strip().split(' ')
x1,y1,x2,y2=(int(a),int(b),int(c),int(d))
x,y=input().strip().split(' ')
x,y=(int(x),int(y))
if (x2-x1)%x==0 and (y2-y1)%y==0:
    a1=(x2-x1)//x
    a2=(y2-y1)//y
    if (a1%2==0 and a2%2==0) or (a1%2==1 and a2%2==1):
        print("YES")
        return
print("NO")
def main():
    x1, y1, x2, y2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a, b = list(map(int, input().split()))

    xd = x2 - x1
    yd = y2 - y1

    if xd % a != 0 or yd % b != 0:
        print('NO')
        return

    xd /= a
    yd /= b

    print("YES" if (xd % 2) == (yd % 2) else "NO")

main()
